channel.title: Need Help Making A Button Close An Interface [Deathlypvpz] [Solved]
channel.description:
So on my Deathlypvpz base, I was fixing a bug with the Play Now button. The button is placed on the login interface, so it looks like this.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zqrams.jpg[/img]
When you click the button it is supposed to close the interface, but it doesn't close anymore. :( Does anyone know how to fix this? If you need me to provide any of my server files, I will happily do so. Thank you so much!

item.title: Need Help Making A Button Close An Interface [Deathlypvpz] [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @iRobertTM iRobertTM
item.description:
@iRobertTM wrote:

I found this in clickingbuttons.java

//Player Handling Panel, points, login interface etc case 73188://PLAY c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); c.sendMessage("Welcome to "+Config.SERVER_NAME+"! If you need help contact a staff member!"); break; case 71032://DONATE c.getPA().sendFrame126("http://www.projectcrid.freeforum.bz", 12000); c.sendMessage("We aren't accpeting donations yet, sorry!"); break; case 71029://VOTE c.getPA().sendFrame126("http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/vote-33727.html", 12000); c.sendMessage("Thanks for voting, this will promote our server!"); break;

Read full topic
